label: ABC2_tI16_122_a_b_d-001
title: Chalcopyrite (CuFeS$_{2}$, $E1_{1}$) Structure
comments: When $c = 2 a$ and $x_{3} = 1/8$ the atoms are on the sites of \href{current_web_home_dir/A_cF8_227_a-001}{the diamond ($A4$) structure}. In that case if we replace the Fe atoms by Cu we get \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_cF8_216_a_c-001}{the zincblende ($B3$) structure}.
